d6898e54777d.name: Danny

7973075212bc.bio: Top Medium writer in sports, TV, humor, NFL, NBA. Words at Cauldron, 16 Wins Ring, Sports Pickle, Bleacher Report, Hoop NBA, and others @wheatonbrando
7973075212bc.name: Brandon Anderson

paragraphs.text: “We appreciate Rob’s efforts to rebuild the team, but feel we have not made any discernible improvement over the last few years specifically,” Magic CEO Alex Martins said in a statement. Firing Hennigan is an understandable decision. The team has won an average of 26.4 games since he was hired in 2012. They have nothing to show for the 2012 Dwight Howard blockbuster. The Tobias Harris trade is still hard to decipher. Mario Hezonja looks like a bust (though I still have hope). Elfrid Payton has not worked out yet. They’ve hired three head coaches in five years. The Magic are an idle franchise that’s neither moved forward nor backward.

paragraphs.name: 6b0c
paragraphs.text: If Hennigan was the fall guy for management’s desire to try to “win now,” that’s unfortunate, but he really did do…

virtuals.subtitle: Even if you do think of someone, like a Hinkie, as an elite general management candidate, he was just a guy on the Rockets a few years ago…

d980220a5174.title: There is no such thing as “elite general manager candidates.”

content.subtitle: Even if you do think of someone, like a Hinkie, as an elite general management candidate, he was just a guy on the Rockets a few years ago…

paragraphs.name: dcc6
paragraphs.text: There is no such thing as “elite general manager candidates.” Sam Hinkie is acclaimed as a forward thinking genius for saying “we should suck and get high draft picks for half a decade” and I see “Jahlil Okafor fitting better into the modern NBA than Kristaps Porzingis.” Of course, his MCW and Kings trade were steals, and he deserves some applause…

paragraphs.text: Is there a Euro-LeBron we can send Euro-JR Smith to for character rehab? Dirk? Marc Gasol? Coach Pop?

5af735db393b.title: Hennigan was really one of the worst GM’s.

paragraphs.name: 52a9
paragraphs.text: Hennigan was really one of the worst GM’s. He just never had any clue about fitting pieces together. Payton next to Oladipo was a terrible non shooting backcourt. Trading for Ibaka is defensible. Trading for Ibaka, signing Biyombo and forcing Aaron Gordon to play the 3 was idiotic.

dd828babd266.title: As a Magic Fan you guys have no idea how many times I’ve considered walking away.

paragraphs.name: 4a4d
paragraphs.text: As a Magic Fan you guys have no idea how many times I’ve considered walking away. Martins needs to peace out too. I wouldn’t mind being bad and fun to watch at least I would have hope then. It was really a truly difficult season.

ebada3474569.title: Bigger question to me is why Alex Martins is still employed by the team.

paragraphs.name: 1e23
paragraphs.text: Bigger question to me is why Alex Martins is still employed by the team. Why have the last bunch of GMs all seemed to not work? All bad hires? It is either a problem with the hiring process or too much interference from above. Has to be one or the other and neither are good.

f76910418ba5.title: What I heard the other day from Magic brass confused me.

paragraphs.name: 86d7
paragraphs.text: What I heard the other day from Magic brass confused me. I live in Central Florida and listen to the sports news daily. I heard yesterday the Magic fired GM Rob Hennigan and it was long overdue. He had 5 years to put at least a playoff team together and failed. OK I get that…the part that confused me? The owner went on to say how great the scouting…

paragraphs.name: fb2c
paragraphs.text: “wiped the whiteboard clean”

paragraphs.name: 0aa2
paragraphs.text: Alright, that was pretty good.

838ffa1363d1.title: What kind of team are the Magic?

paragraphs.name: 7ab4
paragraphs.text: What kind of team are the Magic? They’re an irrelevant one. It’s been years since they were relevant. They’re not even bad enough ever to draft a rookie we all want to watch. Their best draft pick since Shaq-Penny was obviously Dwight, but otherwise it’s Redick, Oladipo, or Mike Miller. Orlando, wyd??
